message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.CG, cs.MM, cs.RO 

The paper presents a method for capturing 3D shape and spatially varying reflectance using photometric stereo, which is a common technique in computer vision and graphics. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves 3D reconstruction, which falls under cs.GR (Computer Graphics) and cs.CG (Computational Geometry). The use of LED lights and an optional turntable suggests that the paper may also be relevant to cs.MM (Multimedia) and cs.RO (Robotics).
